mapper.insert: insert into room (name, number, price, area, facilities, typeid, photo, userid) values (#{name}, #{number}, #{price}, #{area}, #{facilities}, #{typeid}, #{photo}, #{userid})
mapper.select: select roomid, number, name, price, status, area, facilities, typename, photo, room.typeid as typeid, companyname, address, phone from room join roomtype on room.typeid = roomtype.typeid join company on room.userid = company.userid where roomid = #{roomid} and isdelist = 0

select roomid, number, name, price, status, area, facilities, typename, photo, room.typeid as typeid, companyname, address, phone from room join roomtype on room.typeid = roomtype.typeid join company on room.userid = company.userid WHERE price >= #{low} AND price <= #{high} and isdelist = 0
